static {
    	Properties defaultProps = new Properties();
    	try (FileInputStream in = new FileInputStream("culturarte.properties")) {
            defaultProps.load(in);
        } catch (FileNotFoundException e) {
			// TODO Auto-generated catch block
			e.printStackTrace();
		} catch (IOException e) {
			// TODO Auto-generated catch block
			e.printStackTrace();
		}
        URL url = null;
        WebServiceException e = null;
        try {
            url = new URL("http://" + defaultProps.getProperty("maquinaWeb") + ":" + defaultProps.getProperty("puertoWeb") +"/culturarte");
        } catch (MalformedURLException ex) {
            e = new WebServiceException(ex);
        }
        PUBLICADORSERVICE_WSDL_LOCATION = url;
        PUBLICADORSERVICE_EXCEPTION = e;
    }
    
    esto  en servicessercvice del remplasando el otro static
